categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: In 3996 BBY, a battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, was fought in the Nixor system. The Sith were victorious.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. It illustrates the battle on the galactic map of the Great Sith War.
